is a city in Fayette County, and a gateway via 711 to the Laurel Highlands recreational areas of Ohiopyle and Seven Springs Ski Resort and Conferenece Center.

There are no hotels in Connellsville, though there is a Motel jsut on the outskirts of town, the Melody Motor Lodge, which is about what it sounds like, a quintessential motor lodge from back when they were called that, with the remote chained to a desk, and the upholstery dating back from the early 70s (maybe?)
Route 119 is the Main North/South artery connecting Connellsville to the North to the Westmoreland County communities of Scottdale and Mt. Pleasant.

It is mostly just a town where everyone works hard in a mill job or fracking natural gas and then parties on the nights and especially weekends. DJs rotate between the various bars with differing degrees of sucess
You can go to Yough Park and feed the ducks.
There is a supermarket anchoring a couple of differnet plazas, from the Wal-Mart one, whcih is technically out of town a few minutes in neighboring Dunbar Township,

There is the Italian Oven, Double Dragon Chinese Restaurant, The Great Wall Chinese Restaurant, which has better food and service, though some claim that the General tso's is better at the Double Dragon, and an Italian Place near the Martin's Supermarket.
Uncle Vic can always fix you up with a tour or helping hand or any other need that you might have. He can be reached at 724.963.1908.
